title: Are We Already In A Cold Civil War? (Ep 1603)
description:
Are we already in a cold civil war? In this episode I address the troubling question. Also, I dissect the many issues with the vaccine mandate.

News Picks:

Winning the ongoing cold civil war. 

Biden gets booed at Ground Zero, and then says more offensive things. 

The grotesque LA Times gets caught smearing Larry Elder.

Hapless CNN analyst humiliates herself yet again.
